eu.amidst.core.models

Class DAG

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.models.DAG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DAG
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DAG class represents the Directed Acyclic Graph of a BayesianNetwork.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/#bnexample

    For further details about the implementation of this class using Java 8 functional-style programming look at the following paper:

    Masegosa et al. Probabilistic Graphical Models on Multi-Core CPUs using Java 8. IEEE-CIM (2015).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
